ComicInfo.Title: Cabin Fever!
ComicInfo.Series: The Tick's Big Summer Fun Special
ComicInfo.Summary:
Arthur's week in the woods at SIDEKICK CAMP! goes awry when he learns the counselors' sinister purpose: they want to brainwash the sidekicks into being dutiful and unquestioning lackeys and go-fers. Shocked by this discovery Arthur leads a revolt in a bold attempt to free his peers from the shackles of sidekickhood!
WILL SPECIAL GUEST COUNSELOR "THE TICK" CLOSE RANKS WITH HIS FELLOW HEROES?
OR WILL HE CROSS THE LINE AND JOIN ARTHUR'S SIDE?
AND JUST WHAT DO THE MYSTERIOUS BEINGS LURKING IN THE WOODS WANT?!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-15 13:34:09. [CVDB121885] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 16:04:55. [Issue ID 265713]
